definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Nearby is another classroom where female students learn to sew and make the students' school uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 附近是另一间教室，女孩在这里学习缝纫和做校服。

sentences.english: If you buy school uniforms, then you wouldn’t have as much money.
sentences.chinese: 如果你买校服的话，那么你将不会有太多的钱。

sentences.english: some private schools down the area, they have a really strict uniform.
sentences.chinese: 在这里有的私立学校，他们对校服要求很严。

sentences.english: A homeless guy was sleeping on the sidewalk and wearing a Chinese school uniform.
sentences.chinese: 穿着校服的流浪汉躺在人行道上，华强北，深圳。

sentences.english: They are the official school outfitters .
sentences.chinese: 他们是指定的校服供应商。

sentences.english: My daughter has grown out of her school uniform in only six months.
sentences.chinese: 仅6个月，我女儿就长得穿不下校服了。

sentences.english: That is all I have to say about school uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 以上这些就是我对校服的一些见解。

sentences.english: Pupils in Hong Kong usually have distinctive badges on their school uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，小学生的校服上常戴有颇具特色的徽章。

sentences.english: Our SUIS policy requires all students to attend school in their school uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求所有的学生都穿着学校的校服。

sentences.english: But the school that I go to, there is a uniform but it's not as strict.
sentences.chinese: 但是我上的学校呢，有校服，但要求没那么严格。

sentences.english: Girls could choose between these two colors as well.
sentences.chinese: 女孩儿也只能在这两个颜色的校服中选择。

sentences.english: Parents would be going to Divisoria to buy school uniforms for their students.
sentences.chinese: 家长们可能正在Divisoria给他们买校服。

sentences.english: Students need not wear school uniforms in the inter-school concert.
sentences.chinese: 学生参加校际音乐会时不必穿校服。

sentences.english: Had you ever discover your school uniform discolor?
sentences.chinese: 你的校服有脱色的现象吗？

sentences.english: Her school uniform had to be handmade and her feet were already size two.
sentences.chinese: 她的校服需要手工制作，鞋子已经两码大。

sentences.english: As Ed looked at his unform,he was very surprised.
sentences.chinese: 当Edk看到他的校服的时候，他非常惊诧。
